p: E. umbellata berries fruits were collected from the mountainous regions of District Kalam, Malakand Division, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, Pakistan, in the month of August and September 2019. The plant specimen was identified at Post Graduate College Swat, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, Pakistan. Voucher specimen (BGH-UOM-154) were deposited in the Botanical Garden Herbarium, University of Malakand, Pakistan [ 13].
